content: this unique tank has a modest high neck front with an eye-catching keyhole back it is overloaded with texture has incredible drape and can be worn with no undershirt *whoop whoop * plus since it s entirely made up entirely of the tunisian simple stitch tss it s perfect for beginners the pattern offers row by row instructions with color coded sizes example photos and diagrams craft tunisian crochet language english difficulty beginner/easy sizes xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x bust circumference 31 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 recommended bust 30 33 37 41 45 49 53 57 61 materials needed - hooks 3 5 mm crochet hook & a 6 mm crochet hook with 10 cord - yarn sweet delight by baby bee great substitutions include paintbox yarn cotton dk dk joy by loops & threads zz twist by lby wool-ease by lby etc yardage xs - 515 s - 580 m - 665 l - 770 xl - 840 2x - 960 3x - 1030 4x - 1155 5x - 1235 yds - 1 button 12 mm - notions tape measure threading needle stitch markers scissors follow @kaykrochets on instagram/ facebook for new arrivals discounts and giveaways #sizeinclusive
